Package controllers

The game universe and character controllers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CRUDPersonnage
    Manages a game' personnages and their different derivations (soldier, chef) but while ensuring they are create from the correct current universe's associated sub-class.
    GestionnaireUnivers
    Manages the game's context by retrieving (implicitly) the targeted or default universe (its parameters, and its character CRUD).
    Service
    The MetaGame's main controller service, dispatching around the other controllers.

Package controllers Description

The game universe and character controllers.
